item.title: IonSat is recruiting !
item.author: antoine.tavant@polytechnique.edu (Antoine Tavant)
item.description: Take the direction of a satellite Ionsat is a 6U nanosatellite equipped with an electric propulsion engine, dedicated to demonstrating the feasibility of nanosatellite missions in very low orbit (250km).
